segments.text: Hello , Steven . Annie said that you and Julia have had a quarrel , haven ’ t you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s true . We had an argument yesterday . She blamed me for not preparing the supper that day , but it was her turn to cook the dinner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's the reason why you fought ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You two are always quarrelling over little things .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That wasn ’ t my fault , but she said ' you're a disgrace ' to me . I'm about to explode !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you still mad at her now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To be honest , I ’ m not , and I regret a little what I have done .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No way . It ’ s her who should apologize .
segments.speaker: S2
